project_info.title: Status: Season 2 Complete & The Strategic Value of Free

outline.title: Status: Season 2 Complete & The Strategic Value of Free
outline.summary: Summarizes the completion of Season 2 as a stable proof layer and explains why the free core builds trust and leverage.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/7xzCR0XZPo9C.png - The title slide is about autonomous, Gmail-driven workflows. Image 9 is a clear diagram illustrating an email workflow automation system, which is highly relevant.

outline.title: Revenue: Season 3 Bolt-Ons & Licensing Opportunities
outline.summary: Outlines the revenue potential from Season 3 bolt-on modules (Alert Router, Evidence Trigger) and IP licensing.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/3IvV1ixBjeaR.jpg - This slide discusses the CI/CD Alert Router and reducing operational latency in CI/CD pipelines. Image 7 is a clear, professional diagram of the DevOps/CI/CD lifecycle, which provides excellent context.

outline.title: Execution: Demand-Driven Growth & Risk Containment
outline.summary: Details the demand-driven entry condition for Season 3 and the risk profile (survivable failure, real optionality).
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/2GwMYaF87DIt.jpg - This slide details the architecture flow of the CI/CD Alert Router: Ingest -> Parse -> Route -> Action. Image 4 is a flow diagram showing a Service Activity Monitoring architecture with clear steps (Flow, Event Producer, Queue, Filter & Handler, Persistence Handler), which visually represents the routing and processing concept.
